menu.title: Menu "Fitness"
menu.descr: "Fitness" menu is a new approach to cooking: more fresh fruit and vegetables. For people who are interested in sports; active and healthy. It is a completely new product with optimal price and high quality!

menu.title: Menu "Lenten"
menu.descr: The “Lenten” menu is a careful selection of ingredients: a complete absence of animal products, milk from almonds, oats, coconut or buckwheat, the right amount of proteins from tofu and imported vegetarian steaks.

menu.title: Menu “Premium”
menu.descr: In the “Premium” menu we use not only beautiful packaging design, but also high-quality execution of dishes. Red fish, seafood, fruits - a restaurant menu without going to a restaurant!
